CareerDescription: You are an agent of Sigmar, a tool to extract justice and divine the heretics from the immoral failures that are non-believers.

Assignments.Name: Inquisitor
Assignments.Description: The judge of heresy in the Church of Sigmar

Assignments.Name: Defender
Assignments.Description: The defense of the heretic in the Church of Sigmar

Events.EventText: Disaster! Roll on the Mishap Table, but you are not ejected from this career.
Find a new planet with a precursor temple. Unveiling new teachings of Sigmar.
Root out a Lawgar cult and have them punished.
Spend a term rooting out heresy on a city-world
While investigating heresy within the church, you discover a colleague is secretly part of a cult. If you report them, gain an enemy but +2 to an advancement roll. If you do nothing gain a Contact.
Life Event. Roll on the Life Events Table.
Have a ballad of your actions written for Sigmar and have it sung on a church world.
Spend a term rooting out heresy within the Islands.
Spend a term working on a church world, helping to train new inquisitors.
Spend a term rooting out heresy on the frontier
Condemn the wrong part of the scripture and be sent to prison for your heresy.

Mishaps.EventText: Severely injured (this is the same as a result of 2 on the Injury Table). Alternatively, roll twice on the Injury Table  and take the lower result.
Petty church politics gets you kicked out of the church. Soc 8+ to gain a benefit roll this term.
Accidentally condemn the wrong planet for heresy and be removed from the Church because of it.
Accuse the wrong person of heresy, causing the finance minister to refuse to fund any more of your expeditions.
You offended Sigmar himself with your heresy, and are removed from the church.
Injured. Roll on the Injury Table.

CareerDescription: Be a Witcher, the magic wielding monster hunters and intergalatic law enforcement.

Assignments.Name: Witcher Hunter
Assignments.Description: The hunters are those in the wticher whos job it is to go out and fufil contracts, hunting down beasts and people alike. Witchers are expected to fufil at least 5 void contacts a year.

RanksAndBonuses.Item2: Jack of all trades or luck

Assignments.Name: Witcher Crewmmeber
Assignments.Description: You are the heart and soul of the witcher worldship. You keep it running and functional, without you the ship goes no where. Of course, a ship this large has contrcts of its own and sometimes you fufil those yourself as well

RanksAndBonuses.Item2: Jack of all Trade or Luck

Assignments.Name: Witcher Library Worker
Assignments.Description: You work in one of the great libraries aboard a worldship, maintaing the ships ancient texts and studying their secertes. You may know may dark seceretes that others do not, but it is also your job to recover these texts when they are discovered

Events.EventText: Disaster! Roll on the Mishap Table, but you are not ejected from this career.
Spend a term improving a ring of choice. Make Psi 10+ check, if you succeed increase the ring by 1
You spend a term away from the worlds
You spend a term on the Kaer-ship, honing your craft. Roll you Assignments Advancement roll, if you pass you may roll another survival roll.
Spend a term on contact working with some nobility, gaining 1D Political contacts.
Life Event. Roll on the Life Events Table.

Spend a term on on the Kaer-World, learning from one of the masters. Make an Edu 8+ check, if you succeed, improve one ring chosen by rolling 1D (6 means reroll, 1-Void, 2-Aether,3-Material,4-Nether,5-Abyss) by 2.
You spend a term out on a contract
Spend a term on contract in a city, gaining 1D underground contacts
11. Spend a term on contract out in rural areas, gaining 1D Rural contacts.
Spend a term in the library reviewing the works of Gerald and other great thinkers

Mishaps.EventText: Severely injured (this is the same as a result of 2 on the Injury Table). Alternatively, roll twice on the Injury Table  and take the lower result
You violate the witcher code and are banished for it.
You take the wrong job for the wrong person, they get you thrown out of the order.
After a very bad encounter you are nearly killed. After recovering. You may enter a different assignment but have amnesia. Your significant other may be able to help you recover your memories.
You fail to cast a spell and the results are disastrous, an entire planet is slaughtered because of you. You are banished from the order and lose your title of witcher and your void blade.
Injured. Roll on the Injury Table.
